headline: Monolithic Power Systems, Inc. (MPWR): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Monolithic Power Systems, Inc. on X.com by Fierce Beast. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on MPWR. Monolithic Power Systems, Inc.’s share was trading at $855.18 as of September 10th. MPWR’s trailing and forward P/E were 22.38 and 39.06 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
